IN STOCK NOW

  • Structure composition of products: The face shield comprises the protective cover and the fixing device

  • Intended purposes: When used for personal protection, it plays a protective role, blocking body fluids, blood splashes
  • Appearance and structure: The surface of the face shield should be cleanm complete and free from stains and dirt
  • Damage oe separation is prohibited
  • The lends should be smooth and free from burs and scratches
  • The lens color should be transparent to guarantee clear sight during use
  • [/shortdesc]

    Suggested Application

  • When wearing the face shield, it should completely cover tha face of the wearer
  • Vertically it should stand upright without sagging
  • Horizontally there should be no folds when bending it
